title: Endeavor sets pricing for IPO
text: Despite a rough market for IPOs recently - the show must go on. Ari Emanuel's Endeavor is hoping to raise over $600 million in the offering, pricing shares in the $30-$32 range. Endeavor formed when Emanuel and Patrick Whitesell merged their talent agency with IMG in 2013, and have gone on a shopping spree acquiring the Ultimate Fighting Championship, professional bull riders league, and the Frieze Art Fair among other things. Yahoo Finance's Jen Rogers, Myles Udland, and Andy Serwer discuss on The Final Round.
description: Despite a rough market for IPOs recently - the show must go on. Ari Emanuel's Endeavor is hoping to raise over $600 million in the offering, pricing shares in the $30-$32 range.  Endeavor formed when Emanuel and Patrick Whitesell merged their talent agency with IMG in 2013, and have gone on a shopping spree acquiring the Ultimate Fighting Championship, professional bull riders league, and the Frieze Art Fair among other things. Yahoo Finance's Jen Rogers, Myles Udland, and Andy Serwer discuss on The Final Round.
